note.p: Education: City of London School (1900-1904). MA, MD (Camb); MSc (Manc)

Career: Professor of Bacteriology and Immunology, University of London; Director of the Division of Bacteriology and Immunology, London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine; Professor of Bacteriology, University of Manchester (1922-1927); Salters' Research Fellow, Goulstonian Lecturer, Milroy Lecturer, Royal College of Physicians; Honorary Physician to the King
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 699-712, plate, by M Greenwood
